title: Set general styling options — set_style_options
text: five types settings can provided list. First, trans_quotes sets characters must surround free translation gloss. value specified, double quotes. real restrictions value. Second, following elements can set general styling instructions different sections gloss, formatting completely italics bold. items | indicate various names possible.× source|preamble: line glosses source rendered. |first: first line glosses, original language text. b|second: second line glosses. c|third: third line glosses exists. ft|trans|translation: line glosses free translation rendered. items can take one values: , , italics textit set italics. b, bf, bold textbf set boldface. Third, LaTeX-specific settings documented expex documentation. cases default value 0 (0pt). (like settings supported, write Issue look !) exskip|par_spacing: Space example. par_spacing name allowed backwards compatibility, actual name expex exskip. belowglpreambleskip: Space preamble (source printed). aboveglftskip: spacing free translation. extraglskip: spacing aligned lines. Fourth, one setting available LaTeX, particularly thinking slides: numbering, , whether glosses numbered (HTML). Finally, may set following values Word output, used computing spaces alignment: font_family: character vector length 1 indicating font family used lines aligned, list names "" "b" ("c" relevant) indicating font families specific lines. font_size: numeric vector length one indicating font size used lines aligned, list names "" "b" ("c" relevant) indicating font sizes specific lines. page_width: width space margins Word file, pixels, used wrap long examples. default 1332; see output match want, can tweak value.
